title: Skin Border isn't appearing?
body: I had recently bought Sugar Rush Braum (w/o Border), and then later grinded up tokens to buy the Border + Icon. However, if I go into a match, the border does not show.

replies.body:
Sometimes loot redemptions can be a little delayed. If the border isn't present after 24 hours and a relog, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

(Assuming of course that you are aware the border will only appear when you are using the Sugar Rush Braum skin specifically).

Ah the border is present now, thank you!
It was missing from the skin collection so I assumed it broke or something.
